Now, now! That looked like something better to do, even though the
rotting =
carcass of the elk was very enticing to Deadfur. Oh well, duty
calls first,=
 he supposed. He tapped into the nearest comm network.

Deadfur: Deadfur to=
 Watchers Command. Something crashed nearby my
position. I'm going to see i=
f the bogus is some new trick from our
Lunar Friends.

He started running t=
owards the crash site.
